  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_98059</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Main gases found in the air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hauptgase fanden in der Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les gaz principaux ont trouvé dans le ciel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os gáses principais encontraram no ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I gas principali hanno trovato nell'aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικά αέρια που βρίσκονται στον αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los gases principales encontraron en el aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pie chart shows nitrogen and oxygen as the main gases found in the air. Nitrogen makes up about 80% of the air.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">percentage</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kreisdiagrammerscheinen Stickstoff und 
Sauerstoff als die Hauptgase fanden in der Luft. Stickstoff 
bildet ungefähr 80% von der Luft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les expositions azote et oxygène de diagramme 
circulaire circulaire comme gaz principaux ont trouvé dans le ciel. 
L'azote compose environ 80% de l'air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As mostras nitrogênio e oxigênio da carta de 
torta como os gáses principais encontraram no ar. O nitrogênio
faz acima aproximadamente 80% do ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le esposizioni azoto ed ossigeno del diagramma a 
torta come i gas principali hanno trovato nell'aria. L'azoto 
compone circa 80% dell'aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το διάγραμμα πιτών εμφανίζει το άζωτο και οξυγόνο ως 
βασικά αέρια που βρίσκονται στον αέρα. Το άζωτο αποτελεί 
περίπου 80% του αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las demostraciones nitrógeno y oxígeno de la 
carta de empanada como los gases principales encontraron en el aire. 
El nitrógeno hace para arriba el cerca de 80% del aire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stickstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sauerstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozentsatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">azote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
